document_data.name: Skaug
document_data.mainbody: '''Skaug''' was a pirate captain and the founder of the port of [[Skaug (port)|Skaug]] on the island of [[Skaug]] in the [[Nelanther Isles]].
document_data.Description: The pirate had a hook-like nose.
document_data.History: With three ships, Skaug used his ill-gained fortune and supplies to build the port on the small island north of [[Ioma]] around [[1169 DR]].
